channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 澳大利亚工党政府和反对党联盟在澳大利亚央行新货币政策委员会的组成问题上陷入僵局，这可能会破坏修改货币政策所需的立法。
item.description:
Australia’s Labor government and opposition coalition are at an impasse over the composition of the RBA's new monetary policy committee, potentially derailing legislation needed to make changes https://t.co/AqAL66HuvX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 韩国的见习医生在提供紧急护理和手术方面发挥着关键作用，他们的罢工使患者陷入困境
item.description:
The walkout of Korea's trainee doctors, who play key roles in providing emergency care and surgeries, has left patients in limbo https://t.co/QvGAkeKCax

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 高盛正在调整其亚太地区（日本除外）融资集团的高层，并重组其在韩国的领导层，这是该银行在全球范围内更广泛变革的一部分。
item.description:
Goldman is reshuffling the top ranks of its Asia Pacific ex-Japan financing group and rejigging its leadership in Korea, as part of broader changes within the bank globally https://t.co/LJ5VWaxGbq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 香港最高市场监管机构建议中国降低投资者参与股票交易环节的门槛，以提高流动性和交易量
item.description:
Hong Kong’s top market regulator proposed that China lower the threshold for investors to take part in the stock trading link as a way of boosting liquidity and trading https://t.co/Ib490wbDZN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 中国今年最受瞩目的政治事件并未给希望刺激需求的大宗商品多头带来多少欢欣鼓舞
item.description:
China’s highest profile political event of the year provided little cheer for commodities bulls hoping for a jolt to demand https://t.co/zEPuyNAyiP

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 就在澳元汇率回升之际，基金经理们似乎已经对澳元下了赌注
item.description:
Fund managers look to have bet against the Australian dollar just as the currency staged a recovery https://t.co/wBnLpsvJoC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 监管机构称韩国银行家向散户投资者虚假陈述与中国挂钩的高风险结构性产品
item.description:
Korean bankers misrepresented risky China-linked structured products to retail investors, a watchdog says https://t.co/UX2FTDp3gC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 随着波音公司最近在 737 Max 上的失误，空中客车公司有机会巩固其主导地位，并使这场竞争的天平更持久地向其倾斜。
item.description:
With Boeing on the ropes following its most recent mishap with the 737 Max, Airbus has an opportunity to cement its dominance and tilt the balance of this rivalry more permanently in its favor https://t.co/1H6sNy9ucD

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 随着全球投资者开始抢购印尼国债，印尼盾可能会在短期内走软，然后才会获得牵引力
item.description:
Indonesia’s rupiah may be set for near-term weakness before gaining traction as global investors start to snap up the nation’s bonds https://t.co/ltblZfTL1L

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 英国六家自来水公司将斥资 1.8 亿英镑（约合 2.31 亿美元）减少数千次污水溢漏，但最大的自来水公司泰晤士自来水公司（Thames Water）并不在其中，它是污水溢漏最严重的公司之一。
item.description:
Six English water companies will spend a total £180 million ($231 million) to cut thousands of sewage spills, but Thames Water, the largest and one of the worst offenders, isn’t one of them https://t.co/yVDhsMUwFq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 日本避免技术性衰退，支持央行在本月或下月结束负利率政策
item.description:
Japan avoids a technical recession, supporting the case for the central bank to end its negative interest rate policy this month or next https://t.co/cdcd7Widad

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 尽管全球股市反弹，但对中国经济下滑的担忧依然存在
item.description:
China’s slump concerns persist despite global stock rally https://t.co/UfTGaGKscT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 中国居民消费价格自 8 月份以来首次上涨。印度与欧洲四国签署自由贸易协定。两名飞行员在驾驶舱睡着后被停职。以下是您今天需要了解的信息。
item.description:
China’s consumer prices rose for the first time since August. India and four European countries sign free trade pact. Two pilots suspended after both fell asleep in the cockpit. Here’s what you need to know today. https://t.co/iaIbgw5yVN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 10, 2024

item.title: 中原地产数据显示，本周末香港十大屋苑成交量创三年来新高。
item.description:
Hong Kong’s 10 biggest estates saw transaction volume rise to the highest in three years this weekend, according to Centaline Property Agency https://t.co/aJChQVjy5a

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 10, 2024

item.title: 葡萄牙最新消息：据出口民调显示，葡萄牙中右翼联盟AD将在周日的选举中获胜，标志着社会党执政八年后向右翼的转变
item.description:
Portugal Latest: Portugal’s center-right AD coalition is set to win Sunday’s elections, marking a shift to the right after eight years of Socialist rule, according to exit polls https://t.co/02lhIO42KJ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 10, 2024

item.title: 来自 11 个国家的政府部长将与银行家和技术高管一起参加打击欺诈的国际峰会
item.description:
Government ministers from 11 countries will be joined by bankers and technology executives at an international summit to fight against fraud https://t.co/ypNinLmY7D

item.title: 彭博贸易追踪报告显示，面对持续的供应链中断，强劲的需求使全球货运出现了不太可能出现的反弹。
item.description:
Resilient demand has allowed global shipments to pull off an unlikely rebound in the face of continuing supply chain disruptions, according to the Bloomberg Trade Tracker https://t.co/CRZWHNgwdK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 10, 2024

item.title: 由于农历新年促进了消费，中国上个月的 CPI 自 8 月份以来首次出现上涨
item.description:
China’s CPI rose last month for the first time since August as the Lunar New Year boosted spending https://t.co/yGXH6hZ3XX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 10, 2024

item.title: 菲律宾希望美国及其盟国在其勘探有争议的南中国海能源资源的计划中发挥关键作用
item.description:
The Philippines is counting on the US and its allies to play a crucial role in its plans to explore energy resources in the disputed South China Sea https://t.co/K1f6LhvPtw

item.title: 在代表汉莎航空机舱乘务员和火车司机的工会宣布举行更多罢工后，德国准备迎接新一轮的旅行中断浪潮
item.description:
Germany braced for another wave of travel disruptions after unions representing Lufthansa's cabin crew and train drivers announced more walkouts https://t.co/qMgZGn9WUK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 10, 2024

item.title: 日本一家小型塑料回收公司正准备本月通过 SPAC 合并在美国上市
item.description:
A small Japanese plastic recycling company is gearing up to go public in the US through a SPAC merger this month https://t.co/yaREfw6ozN

item.title: 据出口民调显示，葡萄牙中右翼民主联盟在议会选举中战胜了社会党对手
item.description:
Portugal’s center-right AD coalition has the edge over its Socialist opponents in parliamentary elections, according to an exit poll https://t.co/ZCKljkZjQA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 10, 2024

item.title: 只要市场平静，做空波动率就能获得可靠的利润。战争肆虐，选举在即，投资者开始紧张起来
item.description:
Shorting volatility can mint reliable profits, provided markets are calm. As wars rage and elections loom, investors are getting nervous https://t.co/wWQcx21tNU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 10, 2024

item.title: Reddit 及其投资者正在寻求筹集高达 7.48 亿美元的资金，这将是今年迄今为止规模最大的首次公开募股之一。
item.description:
Reddit and its investors are seeking to raise as much as $748 million in what would be one of the biggest IPOs so far this year https://t.co/ZJXxEwaneq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 10, 2024

item.title: 最新民意调查显示，南非执政党非洲人国民大会的支持率已降至 40% 以下
item.description:
Support for South Africa’s ruling African National Congress has fallen below 40%, a new opinion poll shows https://t.co/eKYYA588qg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 10, 2024

item.title: 美国债券市场将迎来自己的 "超级星期二"：美联储将公布新的通胀数据，投资者将据此预测美联储何时开始降息。
item.description:
The US bond market faces its own Super Tuesday of sorts: the release of fresh inflation data investors will use to predict when the Fed will start cutting interest rates https://t.co/9VOJBiS2oW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 10, 2024

item.title: 由于经济表现好于预期，英镑今年跑赢了全球 90% 以上的货币，保持了较高的利率水平
item.description:
The British pound is beating more than 90% of the world’s currencies this year as the economy holds up better than expected, keeping interest rates high https://t.co/mFu2UmUb9e

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 10, 2024

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯的主权财富基金将从其持有的阿美石油公司股份中获得约 50 亿美元的季度股息收入
item.description:
Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is set to earn about $5 billion in quarterly dividend payments from its stake in Aramco https://t.co/IZrULGBwCR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 10, 2024
